comments.body: Why is the cast to `any` needed?

The existing typings have `false` as a possibility for `image` (if we don't use canvas I'm guessing)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9100419/100948094-02c7af80-3557-11eb-932c-dcaa04a3d7db.png)

Which means you can't directly type-cast a potential `boolean` into a `HTMLCanvasElement` without first casting to `unknown` or `any`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9100419/100948171-2f7bc700-3557-11eb-8a6d-fa28138d8315.png)
